title: Anno 1404 Gold Edition
notes:
The game launchers and functions normally but constant Blackscreen, which obviously makes it impossible to do anything

I've tested the following:
  -> Forcing Windowed Mode via Game's config file. Result: Blackscreen
  -> Changing the DirectX version from 10 to 9 in the Game's config. Result: Blackscreen
  -> Launching the Game in a Virtual Desktop. Result: Blackscreen, but mouse was permanently locked in-bounds to only a small portion of the Window.

There seems to be no fix or Workaround for this issue as of yet.
This game runs fine with regular Wine-Staging however.
